publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2517 Des McNulty: SCIAF 40th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Catholic International Aid Fund (SCIAF) on its 40th anniversary; expresses admiration for its work with poor communities across the world and particularly in Africa, Asia and Latin America; acknowledges the generosity and commitment of the people of Scotland to SCIAF throughout this time; notes that two billion people in the world still live in dire poverty, and encourages SCIAF to continue its work with ever-greater urgency and dedication.
S2M-2517 SCIAF 40th Anniversary (lodged on 2 March 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr David Davidson*

S2M-2517 Des McNulty: SCIAF 40th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Catholic International Aid Fund (SCIAF) on its 40th anniversary; expresses admiration for its work with poor communities across the world and particularly in Africa, Asia and Latin America; acknowledges the generosity and commitment of the people of Scotland to SCIAF throughout this time; notes that two billion people in the world still live in dire poverty, and encourages SCIAF to continue its work with ever-greater urgency and dedication. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2517 SCIAF 40th Anniversary (lodged on 2 March 2005) Christine Grahame*
